name: Another Table Tennis Game...
description: Being our first game, we went with some advice from  YouTuber, Tim Ruswick ("Game Dev Underground"), to start simple, and made our own variation of a table tennis game.  Starting with a small and simple game has actually taught us a bunch about the process of making games from start to finish.  At first glance, it seems silly to make something as trivial as table tennis. But then,  when it came to how the game "Feels".  Whoa, we realized real quick that this wasn't going to be as easy as it appears.  It was an humbling experience and now we're running with our next project!  Thanks Tim for the advice, we've learned a lot!
